nodes.text: The Pirates of Prexiar is a three-part Star Wars Roleplaying Game adventure published in West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game, Second Edition, Revised and Expanded.

The Pirates of Prexiar struck at a Rebel Alliance transport which was carrying vital supplies. The crew of the Merry Thrubidor were assigned to take back supplies. The spacers infiltrate the pirate's camp on Prexiar.
After seizing the crates, they escape out to the jungle as the pirates give chase.

Once the crew arrives back at their ship, they stop a group of pirates from blowing their way in. They then take off as Vangar approaches in their corvette. The Merry Thrubidor then fought through an escape route.
The adventure suggests making Vandar a recurring opponent.
